projects.description: An app that generates a random quote from a list of quotes with the click of a button.

Using the principles of Progressive Enhancement and Unobtrusive JS, a dynamically generated set of pagination buttons and a search feature has been added to a long list of students to make it more functional and user friendly.
Added conditional behavior and interactivity along with custom validation and error messages to an online registration from.
Used Object Oriented Programming to craft a fun phrase guessing game similar to hangman and Wheel of Fortune.
A gallery of fictional empoloyees created by rquesting data from the the Random User Public API, complete with a handy modal feature.
